tasks.views.session_views module¶

class tasks.views.session_views.SessionDelete(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: tasks.mixins.DeletionAllowedMixin, core.views.DeleteView

delete(request, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Deletes the Session and updates the Study and other Sessions. Completely overrides the default delete function (as that calls delete too late for us).
